name: Mystic Mountain Pyroto
description:
Pyroto Mountain was a very popular game BBS software from the 1980's through the early 1990's. We have  now have a hosted instance so that everyone can enjoy this amazing piece of software full of mysticism, mystery and trivia as each wizard works his way to the top of the mountain and ultimate glory - or is that the case? Come and try it out. 

WARNING: After sign-up there is a one hour wait to play. This is baked into the software and cannot be changed. Patience, patience wizards... it is a quality that will serve you well on the mountain.
